text: Kazhdogo poslannika My posylali dlya togo, chtoby yemu povinovalis' s dozvoleniya Allakha. A yesli by oni, kogda prichinili nespravedlivost' samim sebe, prishli k tebe i poprosili by proshcheniya u Allakha i poprosil by proshcheniya dlya nikh poslannik, oni by nashli, chto Allakh priyemlet obrashcheniye, milostiv
